import React from 'react' import Content from './Content' import Navbar from './Navbar' import Sidebar from './Sidebar' import Login from "../login/Login" import Alerts from './Alerts' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { signOut } from '../../redux/actions/authActions' function MainLayout() { const isAuthenticated = useSelector(state => state.auth.isAuthenticated) const user = useSelector(state => state.auth.user) const dispath = useDispatch() return ( {isAuthenticated ?
: } ) } export default MainLayout
